Read more Testimonials I found the module very helpful to get myself refreshed with these technical words of accounting. Your module on credibility resume has helped me a lot in modifying my resume, thank you. The program is well defined and continuity from one step to the other is very smooth. Kavitha Senior Accountant Mr. Florent and Mr. Rudi are the very first persons who introduced me to the word “MENTORSHIP.”

I’ve got my very first Financial Controller position not because I am perfect for the job, but because both were willing enough to share their knowledge, invest their time and effort to develop a newbie like me.

Through their guidance I was able to understand the importance of keeping the balance sheet schedule updated, the importance of the P&L review and analysis, and most of all, how proper controls and procedure plays an important role in the hotel industry.

The development and training are not only technical. It also involves attitude development.

I am happy that they have come up with an idea of introducing this platform where they are able to share and introduce more ideas and knowledge in a manner that will be convenient at anyone’s own time and preference. Mary Grace Finance Manager I joined Ka’ana Resort in May 2014 and oh boy, what a difficult time it was for me. Recently graduated and having no clue of where I was, or what I was doing. The Finance team was restructured under the guidance of Mr. Florent and Mr. Rudi. Since then, things became a bit clearer.

Mentoring and training was immediately started by both of them. Both Mr.Rudi’s and Mr.Florent’s philosophy is  “We don’t hide anything in the Finance Department” and as such, I started being exposed to absolutely everything. It was quite a challenging road, but it was worth every bit of it. Not only did I grow in my professional career, but I also became a better individual and for that, I am thankful to both. Sara Financial Controller Guidance, mentoring and training provided by Mr. Rudi and Mr. Florent has had a significant impact in my professional career.

They have always been totally open when it comes to sharing their experiences and their knowledge.

The online program they have built has been easy to follow from the get go. The program easily transitions you from a positive attitude / mindset, to technical development. Following the program at my own pace is a plus. Edwardo Cost Controller The Recipe Calculator IS AN AMAZING TOOL. FUN and EASY to use. It is very crisp, has a fresh look and is well designed. Marlowe CEO, Belize Natural Energy Subscribe to our Weekly Newsletter Leave this field empty if you're human: Follow us facebook linkedin © 2024 Silver Oaks Management Services | Silver Oaks Institute

          All applicable community fees are the responsibility of the buyer to obtain and community manager/owner to disclose prior to ownership or occupancy. Description Silver Oaks is an age-restricted (55+) manufactured home community located in 205 White Poplar Street, Sebring, FL 33876. Silver Oaks is a land-lease community and has a total of 65 home sites. Home site lot rent ranges from $375 - $475 per month and includes the following: Trash pickup Water Sewer The streets in the community are paved, and are of an narrow street width. The water in the community is sourced from the city and the sewer system is city provided. Parking is off-street The community has 0 parking spaces available for RVs. Managed on-site by Rickert Properties. Silver Oaks is an affordable housing choice for active, friendly, age-qualified living. This well-maintained retirement community has easy access to local recreation, shopping and entertainment. Equal Housing Opportunity Amenities check Recreation facilities check Shuffleboard courts check Swimming pool check Laundry facilities check Fishing check Restaurant check Mini golf check Planned Activities check On-Site Sales Office check On-Site Staff Local Climate HOT-HUMID Silver Oaks is located in Climate Zone 1.
      A HOT-HUMID climate is defined as a region that receives more than 20 inches (50 cm) of annual precipitation, and where the monthly average outdoor temperature remains above 67°F (19.5°C) throughout the year. Knowing your area’s climate zone (as assigned by the U.S. Department of Energy’s Building America Program into one of eight zones), can help you predict your heating and cooling needs. Humidity and temperature can of course vary, even by county. The Building America HOT-HUMID climate zone corresponds to the portions of IECC zones 2 and 3 in the dry category. Schools in Hyderabad: CBSE & IB Board Miyapur | Silver Oaks < × Careers Alumni Mandatory Public Disclosure Login Home Our Campuses Kommadi, Vizag Rushikonda, Vizag Bachupally, Hyd Oakdale, Hyd Bowrampet, Hyd Admissions Admission Procedure Kommadi, Vizag Rushikonda, Vizag Oakdale, Hyd Bachupally, Hyd Bowrampet, Hyd Fee Structure Kommadi, Vizag Rushikonda, Vizag Oakdale, Hyd Bachupally, Hyd Bowrampet, Hyd Enquiry Form FAQ Select Page OakDale Campus Wadakpally, Hyderabad . Choosing the right school is one of the most important decisions that you as a parent can take in your child’s life. From the first step to leaving school with confidence and competence of an intellectually stimulating career – Silver Oaks can make all the difference. Fee Structure Enquire Now " [supsystic-show-popup id=100] Celebrated for outstanding, innovative curriculum that empowers every learner. Silver Oaks Oakdale Campus is proud to be recognized for offering an award-winning curriculum that blends innovation, inquiry, and impact. Our unique educational approach fosters not just academic achievement, but creativity, critical thinking, and character in every child. Since 2021, Oakdale has been a hub for transformative learning—combining the best of IB and CBSE frameworks with research-driven, indigenous pedagogy. Here, students grow into lifelong learners, compassionate leaders, and responsible global citizens, prepared to thrive in a dynamic world. Join a campus where excellence isn’t just taught—it’s lived every day. The Best of IB & CBSE Silver Oaks International School, an IB PYP – authorised campus since March 2021, offers a unique blend of IB Primary Years Programme ( Grades 1– 6) and CBSE ( Grades 7– 10), empowering students with inquiry- driven and holistic education. Know More Primary - PP1 to Grade 6 The PYP prepares students to become active, caring, lifelong learners who demonstrate respect for themselves and others and have the capacity to participate in the world around them. It focuses on the development of the whole child. Age range: 3 -12 Offered since 1997 across the world . Read More Implemented since 2013 in Silver Oaks. Silver Oaks International School Oakdale Campus, which commenced operations in June 2021, is an IB candidate school* for the International Baccalaureate (IB) Primary Years Programme and pursuing authorization as an IB World School More CBSE - Grade 7 TO 10 CBSE Curriculum The Acorn enters the Senior Wing with PYP Learner Profile and Stimulated intellectually in the ISAP wing. At this stage we continue to consistently build the leadership qualities in the acorn to face the bigger world. We reinforce the “7 Habits of Highly Effective People” by Steven Covey. Without deviating from the CBSE curriculum, the Design Models are planned to be student centric. More Facilities Silver Oaks offers facilities that encourage & ensure cognitive (knowledge), psycho-motor (skills) & affective (attitude) learning. Our classrooms and open spaces are designed to support our students in all three domains (cognitive, psycho-motor & affective). Moreover, we provide a range of other facilities for sensory, emotional, intellectual and creative enrichment which contribute to the child’s holistic development. SWIMMING Basket ball tennis skating Yoga Music Dance PLAY AREA Throwball Admission Process Step 1: Submit the Enquiry Form Enquiry form for admissions into PPI, PP II & Grade 1 will be made available on our website only from 22 S eptember Prerequisite for the Admission Process Check the Age Criteria Check the Bus stages Step 2: Orientation, School Tour & Application Form Both the parents and the child will visit the school on the dates scheduled to them which will be communicated on the registered email. Parents willing to proceed for admissions can collect and submit the Application form. Step 3: Fee Link & Fee Payment Parent’s will receive a fee payment link in a couple of days after the Orientation Update on Admissions into other Grades Admission into any other grades will happen in the 3rd week of March. The enquiry form will be made available on our website from 15 March based on the availability of vacancies. Essential Points to be noted Admissions are offered on a first-come, first-serve basis. Depending on the admissions received, the school has the right to close the admissions. Mandatory documents to submit the Application Form. Latest Passport size photographs and Aadhar copies of both the parents and the child. Copy of child’s Birth certificate. Fee Structure – AY 25-26 ₹ 56,980 Tuition Fee (per Term) Payable for 3 terms in an academic year Tuition fee to be paid at the time of admission, 14th August and 14th December *Fee Hike of 10% can be expected every year Slab 1  ₹ 11,000 Slab 2 ₹ 12,280 Slab 3 ₹ 14,035 Transport Fee (Optional) (per Term) Payable for 3 terms in a year: at the time of admission, 14th August and 14th December *Fee Hike of 10% can be expected every year Our School Leadership Uma Devi Grandhe Principal With a focus to achieve the school’s vision and mission, with a clear mind and a practical approach, she enjoys meeting various challenges. She comes qualified with a Bachelors in Education and a Bachelors in Commerce. Has nearly 25 years of experience in teaching various grade levels in State, CBSE and IB schools, and with 17 of those in Silver Oaks alone. She is IB PYP and CBSE trained educator. She has created design models for students of middle school, represented at RIE Bhopal and also attended the Quality Leadership Programme conducted by CII. Project Zero by Harvard Course in “Creating Cultures of Thinking”, to create enriching experiences in the school Trained by IBO IB Certificated in PYP CBSE Regularly attends training programs on CBSE approach and curriculum models Don’t Miss our Blog Our News, Events & Articles A Teacher In Silver Oaks A sixth grader once innocently said, “Why should we memorize facts when we can discover them?” For a moment, the classroom fell silent but in that silence was a spark. It was a gentle reminder that education is not just about collecting answers, but about nurturing... Is Phonics the Best Way to Teach Reading & Writing in English? Basanti CS : Head Early Primary - shares her perspective on the role of phonics in learning to read and write. Read on: These days, many parents are concerned that if children aren’t taught using phonics, they may fall behind in reading and writing or miss out on... How is IB curriculum different from others in terms of its teaching methodologies? Originated in 1968, the IB programme was founded by the International Baccalaureate Organisation in Geneva, Switzerland. It is a non-profit educational organisation that offers excellent quality programs for children in the age group of 3-19 years. Discover IB - In... SOIES – Silver Oaks International Education Services Skip to content For more details +97 14 2399348 information@soies.co Linkedin About Us Our Services Education Management & Operations Teacher Training & Development Awards Downloads Partners Contact Us X Education & Training Over 100 Years of Heritage in Education View Services Silver Oaks International Education Services Silver Oaks International Education Services (SOIES) Group, with a Heritage in Education that is OVER A CENTURY OLD (since 1908) and spans FIVE generations, specializes in three areas: Education Management & Operations Teacher Training & Development Academic Research & Curriculum Development Education Management & Operations We currently own and operate 30 British Curriculum Pre-K to K-12 Schools as well as Canadian Montessori Curriculum Preschool with close to 7,000 pupils across three cities i.e. Rawalpindi, Islamabad, Southern Punjab( Gujrat, Gujranwala, Sialkot & Lahore) and Dubai. We specialize in delivering high-quality affordable education and have delivered success through three clear strategies: Commitment to curriculum based on extensive research; Combining best international and tested practices for global citizenship skill development; Consistently delivering against a highly distinguishable USP – providing high-quality-learning-focused-affordable cost-education for lifelong wellbeing. Silver Oaks Schools & College For more details www.silveroaks.edu.pk Canadian Oaks Kindergarten For more details www.canadianoaks.com Teacher Training & Development Finnish-Pedagogy Teacher Training (TLF) Program KOULU Education Group Limited, based out of Helsinki, is an expert organization providing first-class teacher education solutions, based on the best educational expertise from Finland. KOULU & SOIES have joined hands to deliver world class teaching-tools, through a structured program aimed at: Trainee Teachers; Class Teachers from ECE to Primary & Secondary; Education Leaders from 3-months to 12 months delivering face-on-face and remote training combined of up to 18 Modules with 250 hours of contact training and testing combined with 30 weeks of practical application and Global Community of Professionals (COP) support across South Asia & GCC. This TLF (Teach Like a Finn) Teacher Training Program offers Finland National Education Agency accredited certification and is targeting 10,000 Teachers impacting learning outcomes of 500,000 pupils over the next 3 years. For more information, visit our partner’s website: www.koulugroup.com Global Heathy Kids’ Program Education Training We have pioneered, with over 100,000 student and teacher education hours, a new approach to Global Healthy Kids’ Program Education that, in partnership with Nestle, became a Global case study and was adopted by Nestle, world-wide. For more information, visit our partner’s website: www.nestlehealthykids.pk British Teacher Training Services We are a certified “British Council Training Consultancy Service Provider” since 2014 and have delivered over 50,000 training hours to over 550 teachers across 35 schools. For more information on British Council, visit our partner’s website: www.britishcouncil.pk Our Educational Performance Credentials & Awards Top 50 Education Groups led by Top 100 Education Leader SOIES Group recognized as Top 50 Education Services Group & MD SOIES Group, Hassan Sattar recognized as Top 50 Education Leaders (GFEL, Dubai, December 2019). Cover Story Canadian Oaks Kindergarten Canadian Oaks Kindergarten, SOIES Group, featured as Cover Story of Top 10 Preschools in Dubai (The Knowledge Review USA, July 2019). Winner: Best British International Impact School Award (British International School Magazine & ISC Research London, UK, January 2018). Winner: 40 British Council International School Awards Silver Oaks Schools & College: Connecting Classrooms for Global Citizenship Activity Sharing across 53 Countries at 105 International Schools (The British Council – November, 2015 (9 Awards – 14 Countries; 25 Schools); November 2017 (12 Awards; 14 Countries; 25 Schools); November 2019 (19 Awards; 25 Countries; 60 Schools). Winner: Global Education Supplies & Solutions (GESS) Award For “Outstanding Contribution in Education for All” (UAE Ministry of Education Sponsored Award), Dubai – 2016. Our Accredited Educational Research Papers Exploring Teachers’ Perception on Successes and Challenges Associated with Digital Teaching Practice During COVID-19 Pandemic School Closures Taimur, S., Sattar, H., & Dowd, E. (2021). Exploring Teachers’ Perception on Successes and Challenges Associated with Digital Teaching Practice During COVID-19 Pandemic School Closures. Pedagogical Research, 6(4), em0105. Published in October 2021. Preschool Education: Foundation for Life Long Wellbeing (Encyclopedia of the UN Sustainable Development Goals – Quality Education Entry Paper published by Springer, USA – 2019) Education for Sustainable Development & Critical Thinking Competency (Encyclopedia of the UN Sustainable Development Goals – Quality Education Entry Paper published by Springer, USA – 2019) Getting Smart: Need to focus on creating an enabling environment structured around the objective of realizing the true potential of our next generations (Journal on Systematics, Cybernetics and Informatics: JSCI, Volume 14, Number 7, USA – 2016) Educational Crisis in Pakistan: Clear & Present Danger (Finance to Educate More, Session 1: Quantity Vs Quality, Oxfam & ITA – 2015) Analyzing Impact of Formally Taught Life Skills’ Curriculum on Self Esteem and Thinking Skills of Early School Children (The Sixth Asian Conference on Education, Japan – IAFOR, ACE 2014) Strategic Alliance with Global Platforms We collaborate resources to promote quality of various aspects of overall child development and wellbeing education with: Registered Office Unit No. 822, DMCC Business Centre, Level No.1, Jewelry & Gemplex 3, Dubai, UAE – Registration No. DMCC90484; License No. DMCC-320763 UAE Mailing Address: Canadian Oaks Kindergarten, 40 Al Wuheida Street, PO Box 63080, Dubai Pakistan Mailing Address: Silver Oaks Head Office, 33 Civil Lines, Rawalpindi 46000, Pakistan For queries and contact , you can reach us via Email: information@soies.co Tel: +97 14 2399348 Get in Touch: Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. About Us — Silver Oaks Memory Care 0 Skip to Content About Us Services & Amenities Floor Plans Gallery Resources Calendar Newsletter Blog Media Inquiry Join our Team Contact Us Open Menu Close Menu About Us Services & Amenities Floor Plans Gallery Resources Calendar Newsletter Blog Media Inquiry Join our Team Contact Us Open Menu Close Menu About Us Services & Amenities Floor Plans Gallery Folder: Resources Back Calendar Newsletter Blog Media Inquiry Join our Team Contact Us Our Mission Is to be caring professionals dedicated to quality services provided in a comfortable, secure setting. Welcome to Calson Living! Currently, we are in the midst of updating and improving three Memory Care Communities in Northern California. Each of these communities have a long history of providing warm and comfortable surroundings for Residents. My family and our partners have acquired these Communities because we feel adding our touch of community, including meals made from scratch, more staff, appropriate and varied activities and updated facilities, will improve resident vitality. Please come visit us in Menlo Park, Sunnyvale and Montara, California.  Each Community is nestled within a larger community neighborhood.  Imagine, if you will, a bed and  breakfast specializing in memory care. Jason Reyes - Managing Partner Our Vision Is to create communities where people live longer, healthier, and happier lives. Our Team Rose Ruiz Care Coordinator Deborah McCaslin Sales Director Laura Sanchez Activities Director Our Team Who We Are Our Family Watches Over Yours The Reyes family (partners and managers) have been involved in Senior Living for more than 30 years.  The second generation is now creating unique, specialized communities for seniors throughout Northern California.  Our family and our team members work to provide safe, engaging, and comfortable assisted living and memory care communities. Experienced and Supportive We understand that not one care plan fits all.  Daily services are tailored to the needs of the individual.  Our goal is to provide the most affirmative, engaging environment with plenty of fresh air and human contact. We Are a Team of Highly Motivated, Caring Individuals Companionship is key to a trusted relationship with our caregivers. We not only strive to help our Residents with everyday tasks, but we want to develop a caring, trusted relationship that provides a higher level of comfort for both our residents and their family members. Silver Oaks - Memory Care 16 Coleman Place Menlo Park CA 94025 650-322-2022 info@silveroaksmc.com License # 415601052 Copyright © 2022 Silver Oaks Memory Care - All Rights Reserved. Privacy Policy

Silver Oak Health Who We Are — Silver Oak Health HOME EAP POSH CORPORATE EVENTS PRODUCTS ABOUT US EAP POSH CONTACT US CAREERS Let's Get Talking - Mental Health Podcast Back WHAT WE DO WHO WE ARE OUR PARTNERS OUR VALUES LEADERSHIP TALK Back APP AND PORTAL PSYCHOLOGICAL COUNSELLING ONLINE RESILIENCE PROGRAM TRANQUIL MINDFULNESS EMOTIONAL WELLBEING ASSESSMENTS DIVERSITY, EQUITY AND INCLUSION (DEI) SERVICES WELLNESS AND BEYOND DIET AND NUTRITION COUNSELLING WORK-LIFE SERVICES LEGAL AND FINANCIAL COUNSELLING TRUST AND SAFETY WELLBEING COACHES CORPORATE YOGA VIDEOS SPECIAL PROGRAMS JOB BURNOUT PROGRAM EAP FAQ Back POSH POLICY CREATION AND REVIEW EXTERNAL COMMITTEE MEMBER SERVICES POSH TRAINING POSH E-LEARNING POSH ANNUAL FILING TRUPROTECT POSH COMPLIANCE CLOUD POSH FAQ HOME EAP POSH CORPORATE EVENTS PRODUCTS step into the light ABOUT US WHAT WE DO WHO WE ARE OUR PARTNERS OUR VALUES LEADERSHIP TALK EAP APP AND PORTAL PSYCHOLOGICAL COUNSELLING ONLINE RESILIENCE PROGRAM TRANQUIL MINDFULNESS EMOTIONAL WELLBEING ASSESSMENTS DIVERSITY, EQUITY AND INCLUSION (DEI) SERVICES WELLNESS AND BEYOND DIET AND NUTRITION COUNSELLING WORK-LIFE SERVICES LEGAL AND FINANCIAL COUNSELLING TRUST AND SAFETY WELLBEING COACHES CORPORATE YOGA VIDEOS SPECIAL PROGRAMS JOB BURNOUT PROGRAM EAP FAQ POSH POSH POLICY CREATION AND REVIEW EXTERNAL COMMITTEE MEMBER SERVICES POSH TRAINING POSH E-LEARNING POSH ANNUAL FILING TRUPROTECT POSH COMPLIANCE CLOUD POSH FAQ CONTACT US CAREERS Let's Get Talking - Mental Health Podcast WHO WE ARE Sushil Eapen Chief Executive Officer Sushil Eapen is the Founder and CEO of Silver Oak Health. He was the former Country Manager (India) of Pearson Clinical and Talent Assessment, a global publisher of psychological assessments and interventions. He was instrumental in establishing Pearson’s Clinical Assessment business in India. At Pearson, Sushil led a team of Sales, Marketing, Product Development, Information Technology and Customer Relationship Managers. He is passionate about the delivery of mental health services using digital technology. He is networked with a large number of mental health professionals in India and abroad. Sushil is also the founder and Managing Director of Vega, an assessment solutions firm in Bangalore. He earned an MS from Kansas State University and received an MBA in Marketing from Kellogg School of Management, Northwestern University, USA. Sushil is a woodworker and has a wood shop in Bangalore called the Dad’s Workshop. He conducts weekend classes on hand-tool based woodworking for working professionals in Bangalore. Saravanan Neel Chief Operating Officer Saravanan is a seasoned HR & Operations Executive with over three decades of extensive and diverse experience across multiple continents. In his current role as the Chief Operating Officer at Silver Oak Health, he oversees the service delivery operations, customer engagement initiatives for 400 + customers, HR and Training function, and regularly facilitates workshops on various mental health-related topics. Previously as a Director – HR with Mastech Inc., (NYSE: MHH), he has been responsible for human resource strategies and programs, including recruiting, employee relations, compensation and benefits, training and development, immigration, compliance etc. Saravanan has played a key role in expanding Mastech’s India operations between 2010 to 2014. Prior to Mastech, he was associated with iGATE Global Solutions (NYSE: IGTE) and DSQ Software Limited in various HR roles. He holds a Masters in Personnel Management and Industrial relations from Annamalai University, a staunch Mindfulness practitioner & Coach and a Certified Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT) life coach. Saravanan is an avid golfer and is a founder member of Bangalore Golfers Trust, a charity organization that supports children's education and other noble causes. Paul McKeown Chief Content and Global Partnerships Paul is a licensed Clinical Psychologist based in London and has extensive knowledge of assessment and intervention in the areas of cognition, behavior and mental health. He is responsible for relationships with various global researchers and institutions that have intellectual property related to cognition, as well as for building partnerships around the world for sales of the company’s digital intervention products. Paul is also a consultant on International Strategy for the Psychometrics Centre at Cambridge University. He was previously the director for Global Licensing at Pearson Clinical and Talent Assessment where he was responsible for licensing revenues through partners around the world, including pharma licenses. His professional network includes many of the leading players in the assessment and related markets. Paul in his free time enjoys the London Theatre. Vijay Sharma Chief Product and Technology Officer Vijay is an entrepreneur by heart, an engineer by training and a maker for life. In the last 10 years, Vijay has built a series of highly scalable web applications, mobile apps and analytics tools.  Currently, Vijay is responsible for the overall architecture & execution of Silver Oak Health’s digital footprint. Before turning to Silver Oak Health, Vijay was the Product Owner for SAP AI, where he, along with his team, was responsible for the research, development and deployment of SAP’s one of the most promising suites of applications in the field of Artificial Intelligence. While his stint at SAP, Vijay was also instrumental in SAP’s messaging outreach initiatives demonstrating thought leadership in the AI space. Vijay also founded My First Campus, a start-up in the field of computer-adaptive assessments to help companies find the best quality talent in the shortest time frame.  He holds a Management degree from IIM Bangalore and an Engineering degree from the University of Rajasthan. In his free time, Vijay can be seen working on tech-led social initiatives like Restart India Hackathon and Covid Analytics to make the world a better place. Ann Xavier Choolackal Chief Clinical Officer Ann is a Clinical Psychologist with a strong interest in both psychological interventions and assessments. With 15 years of experience, she has worked extensively in clinical and corporate settings. Her keen research interest lies in the neurocognitive aspects of human behaviour. Ann is proficient in Cognitive Therapies (CBT, REBT, DBT), Integrated Psychotherapy, Play Therapy, Mindfulness-based therapies, and brief solution-focused approaches. Previously, she was the Head of Psychological Services at Silver Oak Health. Before that, she worked at Cadabams Hospital as a senior clinical psychologist and at HCG Cancer Hospital as a neuropsycho-oncologist, providing emotional support to patients and their relatives. She has also been part of the R&D department at Pearson Clinical Assessment division, where she was instrumental in the adaptation and Indian norming of the Raven’s Color Progressive Matrices (CPM), Beck Youth Inventories (BYI), and Wide Range Achievement Test (WRAT). Ann completed her M. Phil in Clinical Psychology from the National Institute of Mental Health and Neurosciences (NIMHANS) and is registered with the Rehabilitation Council of India (RCI) as a Clinical Psychologist. Her other interests include Learning Disabilities, neuropsychological assessments, Cognitive retraining, Prehabilitation (long-term illnesses), and the prevention and management of childhood/adolescent emotional issues. Nalini Nagaraj Head of POSH Operations Nalini is an attorney at law, with extensive experience in litigation, non-litigation and crime against women pursuits. She has a passion for developing safe and vibrant workplaces for enterprise India. With a firm belief of healthy minds, healthy staff leading to growing enterprises, she works tirelessly to promote harmonious and compliant workplaces across multiple industries. During her law practice and as a corporate leader, she focused on women’s issues, prevention of child abuse as well as sexual harassment. She has a unique distinction as the first generation lawyer leveraging technology for compliance. She designed, implemented, upgraded, operated and helped many of her corporate clients with thousands of employees to have safe and compliant working environments. She has been an empanelled external committee member for multiple corporates helping them comply with the POSH enactment. Nalini was a guest lecturer of repute teaching Constitutional law and topics of Jurisprudence. She holds an LLB Law degree from the JSS Law College and Master’s in law from the University of Mysore. In her free time, she volunteers at a charitable organization for social, spiritual, environmental, diversity and Yoga causes. Bhavna Asnani Head of Sales and Customer Success Bhavna is the Head of Sales and Customer Success at Silver Oak Health. She leads a national team of sales managers focused on achieving company’s revenue objectives. Additionally, Bhavna manages relationships with Silver Oak Health's expanding corporate customers to drive maximum adoption of their EAP services. Her prior experience includes Learning & Development roles at companies such as WNS Global Services, USHA, SRF, Franklin Templeton, ZS Associates, and Evalueserve. Bhavna holds an MA in Psychology from Delhi University. Antara Vinaya Chandran Head - Client Engagement & Training Antara brings over two decades of experience in Learning and Organization Development, with a deep focus on inclusive leadership, talent strategy, and cultural transformation. At Silver Oak Health, she leads Client Engagement and Training, partnering with organizations to design and deliver impactful learning journeys that prioritize both mental wellbeing and inclusion. Her core belief that mental health and inclusion must go hand in hand to build truly human workplaces, guides her work at the intersection of strategy, facilitation, and capability-building.  Antara has previously led global leadership development and DEI initiatives at Wipfli LLP and held key learning roles at Wipro. She is a SHRM Senior Certified Professional (SHRM-SCP), a certified OD practitioner, and holds postgraduate credentials in instructional design. Anshu Preeti Senior Director – Talent Acquisition & HR Operations Anshu is an HR professional with over 13 years of experience in a myriad of industries including IT, Staffing, Embedded Systems, Pharma, Healthcare and E-learning. She has played key roles in developing and implementing recruitment and sourcing processes, strategically designing and driving end to end recruitment cycles that have proved critical for various businesses. Prior to Silver Oak Health she has worked in Accenture, Capgemini, and Mastech Digital. Anshu has formulated and launched several training programs aligned with current market trends, always stepping up to meet the competition with a can-do attitude and eliciting out-of-the-box thinking from team members. At Silver Oak Health, she is also a valued contributor in the areas of POSH, RMG, R&R and Audit. Anshu holds an MBM-Tech in HR & Marketing from Institute of Business Management and Technology. In her free time, she likes to spend time pursuing art and craft. Prachee Phule Associate Director - Quality Assurance and Training Prachee heads the Quality Assurance and Training function at Silver Oak Health. She devotes her time and expertise in assessing the internal training requirements and curating group and individual interventions for the team of counsellors. While collaborating with the internal stakeholders on the change management process, she is also responsible for managing the workflows, making amendments, and creating relevant documentation for each of the practices to ensure adherence. Prachee is a Queer Affirmative Practitioner, and her practice is based on the principles of Presence Oriented approaches to Counselling like Internal Family Systems, Acceptance and Commitment Therapy, Focusing, and Client-centred Psychotherapy. Outside her work, Prachee likes to spend her free time reading and practicing activities that allow mindfulness, leisure, and engagement with her family and friends. Ankita Kumari Senior Associate Director – Marketing Ankita, as the Senior Associate Director of Marketing at Silver Oak Health, is responsible for driving lead generation, customer engagement, and brand growth. She leads a high-performing team of digital marketers, designers, and content creators, executing impactful campaigns that enhance visibility, attract new customers, and strengthen relationships with existing ones. She oversees key areas such as SEO, social media, content marketing, and strategic communication, ensuring a strong digital presence. As the custodian of the company brand, Ankita plays a pivotal role in making mental health resources more accessible and engaging. She holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Biotechnology from The Oxford College of Science, Bangalore. Vishnu Nair Senior Associate Director – Finance Vishnu Nair is an accomplished finance professional with over 13 years of diverse experience spanning the Retail, Fintech, and Hospitality industries. As the Head of Finance at Silver Oak Health, Vishnu plays a pivotal role in shaping the organization’s financial strategy and ensuring robust fiscal management. He leads a dynamic team of Finance Managers and Executives, overseeing critical functions such as financial planning and analysis, budgeting, compliance, and reporting. Vishnu’s career in finance began as an accountant, where he developed a strong foundation in financial operations and accounting principles. Over the years, he has progressively advanced through various leadership roles, gaining comprehensive knowledge in financial management, risk assessment, and business partnering. Vishnu has a Master’s Degree in Finance and his expertise lies in driving financial efficiency, optimizing processes, and delivering insights that support informed decision-making and sustainable growth. MANAGEMENT TEAM Pallavi Biswas Associate Director – Corporate Sales Pallavi leads the Corporate Sales team at Silver Oak Health. In her current role, she manages a team of Business Development Managers that are responsible for commercialization of  EAP, POSH and DEI programs. She started her career as a psychological counsellor and has in-depth understanding of Employee Assistance Program, and how it is successfully implemented in small and large corporates across India. Prior to Silver Oak Health, Pallavi was a senior business consultant at Human Dynamic India. Pallavi has a Master’s Degree in Counselling Psychology from Amity University and a Bachelor’s Degree in Psychology from University Of Calcutta. Ankur Buragohain Senior Associate Director – Corporate Sales Ankur is the Senior Associate Director of Corporate Sales at Silver Oak Health. He has over 10 years of sales experience. He started his sales career in the BPO industry and also worked in IT tech support at JP Morgan Chase. Before entering the wellness sector, he worked with Weddingz.in and the IMA India CXO forum. Ankur has over five years of experience in healthcare and wellness, having worked with 1to1help, Truworth, DocOnline, and Connect & Heal. He believes that making a positive impact on others and offering support to people brings happiness and personal growth. He holds a BCA degree, an MBA in Marketing, and a postgraduate qualification in Digital Marketing and Communication. He is a pet parent to two lovely dogs, loves travelling and cooking, and considers playing badminton more than just a hobby. Harish Chandrashekar Associate Director - Psychological Services Harish Chandrashekar is an experienced psychological services professional with over 14 years in mental healthcare. He has been with Silver Oak Health for over 5 years, currently serving as the Associate Director of Psychological Services. Harish holds a master’s in clinical psychology from Christ University and specializes in managing psychological support and crisis Hotline services. Before joining Silver Oak Health, Harish worked with several Employee Assistance Program (EAP) providers and at Sympatica. He oversees internal teams, manages affiliate networks, and ensures high-quality service delivery in his current role. Harish is also responsible for staff training, quality assurance, and program development to meet clients' needs. With his experience and leadership, Harish plays a key role in providing timely support to clients in crisis and ensuring that services remain effective and professional. His commitment to service excellence has contributed to the success of Silver Oak Health. Shampa Singh Associate Director - Products Shampa is an Associate Director of Products with a diverse background spanning mental health, healthcare, and biotechnology. She began her product management journey at Wysa, then an early-stage startup, where she helped build innovative digital mental health applications for over 3.5 years. She then moved to Gigforce, where she successfully delivered the MVP for a gig worker platform. During the COVID-19 pandemic, she joined Algorithmic Biologics, where she managed operations and partnerships to support large-scale RT-PCR testing. Her passion for mental health and healthcare later brought her to Silver Oak Health, where she continues to contribute meaningfully. She holds a Master’s degree in Life Sciences from the Tata Institute of Fundamental Research, Mumbai, with a strong foundation in research and biotechnology. To broaden her perspective beyond basic sciences, she completed a diploma in Liberal Arts at Ashoka University as part of the Young India Fellowship. Outside of work, Shampa enjoys playing Ultimate Frisbee and badminton. ADVISORS NRK Raman, Advisor and Lead Investor NRK Raman comes with over 30 years of total experience in the IT industry, out of which 25 years were involved in providing IT solutions to financial services industries across the globe. He is the former MD and CEO of Oracle Financial Services Software Ltd. (OFSS), and retired in October. He currently serves as Lead Investor / Advisor / Board Member to a few emerging software companies in India, including Nanobi Data & Anaytics, Hexagon Global IT Services, Tyfone Inc., Shrishti Software, I-exceed Technologies, and Miles Software. He has a Masters in Physics, specialising in Electronics from Mumbai University, and has also completed an executive education program on ‘Strategy: Building and Sustaining Competitive Advantage ’ from Harvard Business School. He is a charter member of TiE Bangalore, and Advisor to iSpirit Foundation, a thinktank for software product start-up companies. Dr Yugandhar Chimata, Advisor and Lead Investor Dr Yugandhar Chimata is the CEO of Dallas Renal Group, a premier nephrology centre in Dallas, Texas. With a degree in Human Resource Management from Tata Institute of Social Sciences (TISS) Dr Chimata started his career working as a Human Resource Executive with Asian Paints. Following this, he decided to pursue his passion for medicine and attended the JSS Medical College in Mysore. He subsequently completed a three-year residency program in Internal Medicine and a two-year Nephrology Fellowship Program at the St. Louis University Hospital in St. Louis, Missouri, USA. Dr Chimata is a firm proponent of providing easy access to health care, and is deeply passionate about his role in making mental health care available to people with mild to moderate mental illnesses, from the comfort and privacy of their homes.
